item.description:
Are you looking for like-minded progressives to hang out with in Boston? Want to cross-promote your events and campaigns over a game of Boggle? Are you new to the area and looking for groups to get involved in? Are you psyched about building strong cross-issue coalitions while playing Scattegories?

JOIN SOCIALIZING FOR JUSTICE AT SOUL FIRE BBQ FOR GAME NIGHT!

No program. No speaker.
Just bring your favorite board game and enjoy yourself.

RSVP - YES, MAYBE OR NO
WHAT BOARD GAME(S) ARE YOU BRINGING OR WANT TO PLAY?

___________________________________________
SoJust is for feminists, people working against racism, class activists, queer pioneers, genderbenders, environmentalists, artists and all people across Greater Boston working for justice.

But it's not work! Instead, we're building a progressive cross-issue network through fun social events.

At SoJust events you can hang out with friends, make new ones, find a date, get the scoop on a job, and find out what's going on this weekend - political or social. And the best part is that SoJust members share your vision of building a more just world.
item.name: Scrabblerousers for Justice! (Game Night @ Soul Fire BBQ)
